page.title: 02OLD HOUSING IN BERROW
page.content: In the Berrow area there are quite a number of old houses which are being modernised.These are fairly big houses,most are single storey. We talked to some inhabitants and asked them some questions.Among their comments were the following:-one couple were moving;one oldish person complained about the footpaths and said,he wanted another road connected into the Lesiure centre so there wouldn't be so much traffic,or a footpath.People thought the area was safe for children to play but they weren't too pleased about the beach because of the nudists at weekends. In the winter there is nothing to do,but in summer there is plenty to do and see.The transport in Brean is adequate in the summer,but in winter there is not enough.
